mapper.insert: insert into userrole (USERNAME, FOUNDER, CDATE, UDATE) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{founder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{udate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
